channel.title: Polymorphism on coda.life
channel.description: Recent content in Polymorphism on coda.life

item.title: Poor Man's Polymorphism
item.description: Just when you think you know everything about C… a way to polymorph C data structures. How? Structs with the same field types and ordering can be casted. Note: Don't do anything like this. Not portable or guaranteed that I know of.
